channel.title: Mosquitto on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Mosquitto on Rusty Eddy

item.title: MQTT For Controllor Communication
item.description: The MQTT message bus is a simple but critical element of our MBR software design. MQTT provides what is known as a publish/suscribe or pubsub communications model. This model of machine to machine communication has some attractive benefits for realtime driving algorithms that we will discuss in this post.
